entry.title: Photos Post 9: Early Photographs (before 1976), Part 21
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 1 Photo of the event 1972-0407 Silver Wedding Anniversary, India has been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 medium-high resolution from the Named Collections.
Direct link to the Photo in the smallest gallery: Collection 1972.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
